pages.text: Imbue a nearby $(l)Armor Stand$() with clay and essence of life.$(br)The effigy is a makeshift totem of undying and you will replace it and save you from death once. The Effigy will be bound to the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$().$(br2)
A $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() of Effigy can be cast.$(br)$(o)Range of the ritual is 16 with cat, 8 without$()$(br)How about becoming dirt.
